text:
──Mano, I was surprised to see you at the park so
early in the morning. Were you out for a run or something?

Um... yes,
well... I woke up early, and...

Haha, that's impressive. If it were me,
I'd probably just go back to sleep for a bit.

...In the dream,
I was watching the sunrise from a hot air balloon...

...The sky gradually brightened,
and it was so beautiful as it turned a pale purple...

...When I woke up, the sunrise outside my window
felt like a continuation of the dream...

...I couldn't sit still, so I just had to
get out of the house... that's why...
That's why I went for a run...?
